marklogic.body:
I go for a dish of Breyer's brand cherry vanilla or sometimes their white mint chocolate chip ice cream. I've been looking for the Haagen Dazs" fleur de sel" tubs (squares of soft chocolate-covered caramels with sea salt mixed in--heavenly!).
I'm not above chomping on a bowl of Cold cereal or a handful of peanut M&Ms either. :) Or this is silly, but if the cupboard is bare, I'll even Raid the food storage pantry from the basement and fill up a measuring cup with semi-sweet chocolate chips to get me through.
